name: Summer Bummer
description:
Help your family avoid sunburns - Created during a 45h long Game Jam in Fribourg, the LvlUpGameJam.

We were 4 members, 2 programmers, 1 artist and 1 sound designer. For three of the members of the team this was their first game jam.

You control the mother of a family, your husband and your kid are susceptible to sunburns. Your husband is sleeping and his sunshade isn't working very well so it closes itself randomly, whenever you  open  his sunshade, he gives you "thank you" kiss and somehow you get impregnated, after a while a new kid is born.

As for your kids they run all around the map, get near them for them to follow you, bring them to the home sunshade (the blue one), they'll stay there until they've fully recovered.

The goal of the game is to not let anyone die.
